directions: Mix pineapple with juice, tomato sauce, green bell pepper, onion, brown sugar, cider vinegar, tomato paste, Worcestershire sauce, and garlic together in a bowl; pour over the ribs.
Cook on Low until ribs are cooked through and tender, 8 to 10 hours.
ingredients: 1 (4 pound) package country-style pork ribs, or to taste
title: Sweet and Sour Country-Style Ribs
